thread.title: Pretty Little Liars makes a five year jump in this new clip from season 6, part 2
thread.title_full: Pretty Little Liars makes a five year jump in this new clip from season 6, part 2

title: Pretty Little Liars makes a five year jump in this new clip from season 6, part 2
text:
1 US TV News Pretty Little Liars makes a five year jump in this new clip from season 6, part 2 Saturday, Oct 10 2015, 14:13   Twitter Share on Google+ Now that Pretty Little Liars has revealed its biggest secret , the second half of season 6 kicks things off with a five-year time jump that will see how the cast is getting on after college.During the show's New York Comic Con panel, the makers premiered the first four minutes of the opening episode of season 6B.Alison is teaching in Rosewood High and asks her former best friends to come back home for Charlotte's court case.Aria has published a book, Hanna is in New York breaking into the fashion world, Emily is bartending and Spencer is working in politics."Spencer's an incredibly intelligent character and she hasn't gotten to realise her full potential [in the past]," explained Spencer actress Troian Bellisario . "For her to be so successful in her career and be in a political world was very exciting for me." 
Â© ABC / Ron Tom/EW Pretty Little Liars has already been confirmed for a seventh season, although that could potentially be its last .The show makes its US return next January, where it will be broadcast on Freeform . It airs on Netflix in the UK.
